info.name: doc-ndserver-sync-wrk - R0 Core Testing
info.description: Comprehensive test scenarios (A-E) for NMD transformation library with eval-based approach.

item.name: 00 - Setup

request.description:
**Global Setup**

**How to Run:**
1. Run the entire folder from top to bottom
2. Transformation library loaded from collection-level pre-request
3. Each request uses eval() to access library functions

**Pattern:**
- Load NMD sample from environment
- Upload content to S3
- Build patch request using transformation library
- CREATE/UPDATE document via Metadata API
- Validate results

item.description: Global setup - Transformation library initialization

item.description:
Creates a content snapshot and uploads document content to S3.

This folder adds the content upload workflow between initial setup and the two test scenarios. It:
1. Extracts content metadata from the NMD message
2. Creates a snapshot entity and gets a presigned S3 URL
3. Uploads content to S3 using the presigned URL
4. Verifies the snapshot was created successfully

This ensures documents have both metadata AND content before testing sync scenarios.

item.description: Create document in Scenario A: Upload → Create (Standard)

Standard document upload and creation workflow. Tests baseline transformation of a simple document.

item.description:
Creates a content snapshot and uploads document content to S3.

This folder adds the content upload workflow between initial setup and the two test scenarios. It:
1. Extracts content metadata from the NMD message
2. Creates a snapshot entity and gets a presigned S3 URL
3. Uploads content to S3 using the presigned URL
4. Verifies the snapshot was created successfully

This ensures documents have both metadata AND content before testing sync scenarios.
